data.title: TD TRB 87 Guide For Fishing Gear Survey
data.meta_description: TD TRB 87 Guide for Fishing Gear Survey - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document provides a guide for conducting fishing gear surveys. It outlines the necessary pre-survey preparation activities, including meeting with stakeholders, preparing tools and equipment, and developing survey forms. The guide describes the field survey procedures, which involve interviewing fishers, observing and documenting different types of fishing gear and their components, vessels, fishing grounds, target catches, and financial aspects of fishing activities. Various fishing gear are illustrated and their key characteristics and uses are explained. The overall goal is to understand current fishing practices in order to inform sustainable fisheries management policies.
